How will AI have an impact on Marketing

AI has already started having an impact on marketing and advertising. Since the availability of Big Data, you can reach exclusively potential customers withing your market niche. A good example is targeted advertising on Social Media: but to exploit it, you need to know what to search.
Do I need to be a big company to use these tools?

No, as long as you have access to data you can gather any kind of information from your customers. Collecting data in big volume is expensive, but under a threshold it is even downloadable for free. For example, open-source studies on people’s personalities or customer satisfaction in regards to certain products will save you a lot of money.

You can always choose to download the data yourself connecting to DataBases and use AI tools, but a good amount of work is already accessible for free on the internet, in websites such a Kaggle or GitHub.
Are those analysis tools innovative?

In reality, these statistical tools have been present for a long time. However, their barriers to entry are much lower now. If years ago you needed a team of experts to perform the necessary analysis, now any open-source machine learning tool operated by a single engineer can output the same results for a much lower price.
Will my competitors use similar technologies?

Every high performing company (not only the Big Techs) make their market analysis, but they also rely on their data when they can. Expect your competitors to make these accurate researches to reach their potential customers.
